channel.title: Object Detection on Emanuele Viglianisi
channel.description: Recent content in Object Detection on Emanuele Viglianisi

item.title: Negative Samples Dilemma In Object Detection
item.description: Table Of Contents 🔥 Motivation 🔫 Why 🔩 What are negative samples? 🩺 The Other Side 🙏 Comments & Feedback Follow me 👇 🔥 Motivation Link to heading This is the dilemma that every machine learning practitioners have faced it while working on object detection problem. In this blog, I will share my thoughts, in order to help new engineers in making the correct choices when they are setting up the dataset pipeline.

item.title: Comparing a transformer-based detector with a classical detector
item.description: Table Of Contents 🔥 Motivation 🔫 Dataset Description 🔩 Set-Up 🩺Results 👍 Coco Metric CNN 👍 Coco Metric Transformers 🙏 Comments & Feedback Follow me 👇 🔥 Motivation Link to heading Since the introduction, by Facebook, Transformer based detectors are getting a lot of traction in Computer Vision and Object Detection. In this blog, I will show how a partially trained detector using SWIN transformer backbone leads to a very competitive performance compared to a fully trained classical detector.
